name: Bullet list
author: Total.js
js:
exports.id='ul';exports.name='Bullet list';exports.version=1;exports.icon='ti ti-list';exports.author='Total.js';exports.version='1';exports.config={items:[]};exports.sortindex=6;exports.make=function(widget,config,element){var isnew=false;widget.save=function(){var arr=[],elements=element.find('li');for(var el of elements)arr.push({id:el.getAttribute('data-id'),name:el.children[0].innerHTML});return{items:arr}};var check=function(){if(!element.find('li').length)widget.remove()};var append=function(el){var id=widget.makeid();var html='
    • '.format(id);if(el)el.after(html);else element.find('ul').append(html);var li=element.find('li[data-id="{0}"]'.format(id));li[0].$newbie=true;li.trigger('click')};element.on('click','li',function(){var li=$(this);widget.edit(li.find('div'),{backslashremove:true,parent:li},function(response){if(response.text){var newbie=li[0].$newbie;if(newbie)delete li[0].$newbie;response.change&&widget.change(newbie?'insert':'update',li);if(response.key===13||response.key===8)setTimeout(append,100,li)}else{li.remove();widget.change('remove',li);widget.end()}check()})});widget.newbie&&append();var builder=[];for(var item of config.items)builder.push('
  • {1}
    • '.format(item.id,item.name));if(builder.length)element.find('ul').html(builder.join(''))};

name: Callout
author: Total.js
js: exports.id='callout';exports.name='Callout';exports.version=1;exports.icon='ti ti-receipt';exports.author='Total.js';exports.version='1';exports.config={text:'',icon:'',color:''};exports.sortindex=5;exports.make=function(widget,config,element){widget.save=function(){return{html:element.find('.text').html(),icon:element.attrd('icon'),color:element.attrd('color')}};element.on('click','.text',function(){widget.edit(this,{},function(response){if(response.text){widget.change();widget.end(response.key)}else widget.remove()})});widget.on('focus',function(){element.find('.text').trigger('click')});element.on('click','.icon',function(){if(widget.readonly)return;var opt={};opt.element=$(this);opt.callback=function(val){opt.element.rclass2('ti').aclass(val);element.attrd('icon',val);widget.change('update')};SETTER('icons/show',opt)});element.on('click','.color',function(){if(widget.readonly)return;var opt={};opt.element=$(this);opt.align='center';opt.callback=function(val){element.css('background',val);element.attrd('color',val);widget.change('update')};SETTER('colorpicker/show',opt)});widget.newbie&&widget.emit('focus');if(config.icon)element.attrd('icon',config.icon).find('.icon').rclass2('fa').aclass(config.icon);if(config.color)element.attrd('color',config.color).css('background',config.color);if(config.html)element.find('.text').html(config.html)};

name: Code
author: Total.js
js: exports.id='code';exports.name='Code';exports.version=1;exports.icon='ti ti-code';exports.author='Total.js';exports.version='1';exports.config={code:''};exports.sortindex=10;exports.import=['https://cdn.componentator.com/highlight.min@914.css','https://cdn.componentator.com/highlight.min@914.js'];exports.make=function(widget,config,element){widget.save=function(){return{code:element.find('code').text()}};element.on('click','code',function(){var el=$(this);var opt={};opt.html=el.text().encode();opt.multiline=true;opt.tabs=true;widget.edit(el,opt,function(response){if(response.text){el.html(hljs.highlightAuto(response.text).value);widget.change();widget.end(response.key)}else widget.remove()})});widget.on('focus',function(){element.find('code').trigger('click')});widget.newbie&&widget.emit('focus');if(config.code)element.find('code').html(hljs.highlightAuto(config.code).value)};

name: Counter
author: Total.js
js: exports.id='counter';exports.name='Counter';exports.version=1;exports.icon='ti ti-calculator';exports.author='Total.js';exports.version='1';exports.config={items:[]};exports.sortindex=5;exports.make=function(widget,config,element){var isnew=false,template='{1}{2}{3}';widget.save=function(){var rows=element.find('tbody').find('tr');var arr=[];for(var row of rows){row=$(row);var cols=row.find('td');var val=$(cols[1]);arr.push({id:row.attrd('id'),name:cols[0].innerHTML,value:val.find('.value').html(),unit:val.find('.unit').html()})}return{items:arr}};var check=function(){if(!element.find('tbody').find('tr').length)widget.remove()};var recount=function(){var arr=element.find('tbody').find('.value');var count=0;for(var el of arr){var num=$(el).text().trim();switch(num.charAt(0)){case'-':num=num.substring(1).parseFloat();count=count-num;break;case'*':num=num.substring(1).parseFloat();count=count*num;break;case'/':num=num.substring(1).parseFloat();count=count/num;break;default:count+=num.parseFloat();break}}element.find('tfoot').find('.value').html(count+'')};var append=function(el){var id=widget.makeid();var html=template.format(id,'','','h');if(el)el.after(html);else element.find('tbody').append(html);var tr=element.find('tr[data-id="{0}"]'.format(id));var col=tr.find('.name');col[0].$newbie=true;col.trigger('click')};element.on('click','.add',function(){setTimeout(append,100)});element.on('click','.edit',function(){var el=$(this);var opt={};opt.endwithtab=true;widget.edit(el,opt,function(response){if(response.text){var newbie=el[0].$newbie;if(newbie)delete el[0].$newbie;var name=el.attrd('id');if(name==='value')recount();if(name==='unit')element.find('.unit').text(response.text);response.change&&widget.change(newbie?'insert':'update',el.closest('tr'));if(name==='name'||response.key===9){setTimeout(()=>el.next().find('.value').trigger('click'),100);return}if(response.key===13||response.key===8)setTimeout(append,100,el.closest('tr'))}else{el.closest('tr').remove();widget.end()}check()})});widget.newbie&&append();var builder=[];for(var item of config.items)builder.push(template.format(item.id,item.name,item.value,item.unit));if(builder.length){element.find('tbody').append(builder.join(''));recount()}};
css: .CLASS{position:relative;margin-bottom:5px}.CLASS table{margin:5px 0 0;padding:0;width:100%}.CLASS table td{border:1px solid #D0D0D0;padding:6px 10px}.CLASS table td.number{text-align:right;width:150px;font-family:Menlo,Consolas,monospace;font-size:14px}.CLASS table td.number .unit{margin-left:5px;color:#999;font-size:12px}.CLASS table tfoot td.number{background-color:#F0F0F0}.CLASS .add{position:absolute;right:-20px;top:8px;color:#68B25B;cursor:pointer}.readonly .CLASS .add{display:none}
html: 0h

name: Credentials
author: Total.js
js:
exports.id='credentials';exports.name='Credentials';exports.version=1;exports.icon='ti ti-key';exports.author='Total.js';exports.version='1';exports.config={items:[]};exports.sortindex=5;exports.make=function(widget,config,element){var isnew=false,template=Tangular.compile('{{ name | raw}}
{{ password | raw}}
**************
');widget.save=function(){var rows=element.find('tr');var arr=[];for(var row of rows){row=$(row);var obj={};obj.id=row.attrd('id');obj.name=row.find('.name').html();obj.password=row.find('.value').html();arr.push(obj)}return{items:arr}};var check=function(){if(!element.find('tbody').find('tr').length)widget.remove()};var append=function(el){var id=widget.makeid();var html=template({id:id});if(el)el.after(html);else element.find('tbody').append(html);var tr=element.find('tr[data-id="{0}"]'.format(id));var col=tr.find('.name');col[0].$newbie=true;col.trigger('click')};element.on('click','.add',function(){if(!widget.readonly)setTimeout(append,100)});element.on('click','.camouflage',function(){var el=$(this).closest('td').rclass('secret');if(!widget.readonly)setTimeout(()=>el.find('.edit').trigger('click'),50)});element.on('click','.edit',function(){var el=$(this);el.closest('td').rclass('secret');if(widget.readonly)return;var opt={};opt.endwithtab=true;if(el.hclass('value')&&!this.innerHTML){var chars='ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz1234567890'.split('');var builder='';for(var i=0;i<20;i++){var index=Math.floor(Math.random()*chars.length);builder+=chars[index]}this.innerHTML=builder}widget.edit(el,opt,function(response){if(response.text){var newbie=el[0].$newbie;if(newbie)delete el[0].$newbie;var name=el.attrd('id');if(name==='password')el.closest('td').aclass('secret');response.change&&widget.change(newbie?'insert':'update',el.closest('tr'));if(name==='name'){setTimeout(()=>el.next().find('.value').trigger('click'),100);return}if(response.key===13||response.key===8)setTimeout(append,100,el.closest('tr'))}else{el.closest('tr').remove();widget.end()}check()})});widget.newbie&&append();var builder=[];for(var item of config.items)builder.push(template(item));builder.length&&element.find('tbody').html(builder.join(''))};
css: .CLASS{position:relative}.CLASS table{margin:5px 0 10px;padding:0;width:100%}.CLASS table td{border:1px solid #D0D0D0;padding:6px 10px;vertical-align:top}.CLASS table td.password{width:68%;font-family:Menlo,Consolas,monospace;font-size:14px;background-color:#F0F0F0}.CLASS table .camouflage{display:none}.CLASS table .secret .value{display:none}.CLASS table .secret .camouflage{display:block;cursor:pointer}.CLASS table .secret .camouflage i{margin-right:7px}.CLASS .add{position:absolute;right:-20px;top:8px;color:#68B25B;cursor:pointer}.readonly .CLASS .add{display:none}

name: Files
author: Total.js
js:
exports.id='files';exports.name='Files';exports.version=1;exports.icon='ti ti-upload';exports.author='Total.js';exports.version='1';exports.config={items:[]};exports.sortindex=5;exports.make=function(widget,config,element){var template='
{3}{2}
',isnew=false,check=function(){if(!element.find('.files').find('> .file').length)widget.remove()};var append=function(file){var id=widget.makeid();var mb=(file.size/1024/1024).floor(1);var html=template.format(id,file.url,file.name.encode(),mb+' MB',file.ext);element.find('.files').append(html)};var upload=function(){var opt={};opt.multiple=true;opt.callback=function(files){for(var file of files)append(file);widget.change()};widget.upload(opt)};widget.save=function(){var arr=[],elements=element.find('.file');for(var el of elements){el=$(el);var obj={};obj.id=el.attrd('id');obj.url=el.find('a').attr('href');obj.size=el.find('.size').text();obj.name=el.find('.name').html();obj.ext=el.attrd('ext');arr.push(obj)}console.log(arr);return{items:arr}};element.on('click','.add',function(){if(!widget.readonly)setTimeout(upload,100)});element.on('click','.remove',function(e){e.preventDefault();$(this).closest('.file').remove();widget.change()});widget.newbie&&upload();var builder=[];for(var item of config.items)builder.push(template.format(item.id,item.url,item.name,item.size,item.ext));builder.length&&element.find('.files').html(builder.join(''))};

author: Total.js
js: exports.id='image';exports.name='Image';exports.version=1;exports.icon='ti ti-image';exports.author='Total.js';exports.version='1';exports.config={};exports.sortindex=1;exports.make=function(widget,config,element){var template='',upload=function(){if(widget.readonly)return;var opt={};opt.accept='image/*';opt.callback=function(files){var file=files[0];element.find('.image').html(template.format(file.url,file.name));widget.update('change')};widget.upload(opt)};widget.save=function(){var img=element.find('img');var alt=element.find('.alt');return{url:img.attr('src'),name:img.attr('alt'),alt:alt.html()}};element.on('click','.alt',function(){if(widget.readonly)return;widget.edit(this,{},function(response){if(response.text){widget.change();widget.end(response.key)}})});element.on('click','.empty',upload);widget.newbie&&setTimeout(upload,100);config.url&&element.find('.image').html(template.format(config.url,config.name))};

js: exports.id='indent';exports.name='Indent';exports.version=1;exports.icon='ti ti-arrow-right';exports.author='Total.js';exports.version='1';exports.config={widgets:[]};exports.sortindex=5;exports.make=function(widget,config,element){var column=element[0].children[0];widget.save=function(){var obj={};obj.widgets=widget.widgets.save(column);return obj};$(column).on('click',function(e){if(e.target.classList.contains('column')){e.stopPropagation();e.preventDefault();widget.widgets.append(this)}});if(widget.newbie)widget.widgets.append(column);else widget.widgets.load(column,config.widgets)};

exports.id='table';exports.name='Table';exports.version=1;exports.icon='ti ti-table';exports.author='Total.js';exports.version='1';exports.config={header:true,footer:false};exports.sortindex=5;exports.make=function(widget,config,element){console.log(widget,arguments);widget.save=function(){return CLONE(config)};element.append('
Header
Header
@(Add row)
');if(widget.newbie){widget.change();widget.next()}element.on('click','.config',function(){if(widget.readonly)return;var opt={};opt.element=this;opt.offsetY=5;opt.items=[];opt.items.push({id:'header',name:'@(Show header)',type:'boolean',value:config.header==true});opt.items.push({id:'footer',name:'@(Show footer)',type:'boolean',value:config.footer==true});opt.callback=function(cfg){COPY(cfg,config)};SETTER('inlineproperties/show',opt)})};

author: Total.js
js:
exports.id='task';exports.name='Task';exports.version=1;exports.icon='ti ti-check-square';exports.author='Total.js';exports.version='1';exports.config={items:[]};exports.sortindex=7;exports.make=function(widget,config,element){var template=Tangular.compile('
{{ name | raw}}
');var isnew=false,isend=false;widget.save=function(){var el=element.find('figure');return{id:el.attrd('id'),name:el.find('.text').html(),checked:el.hclass('checked')}};element.on('click','.checkbox',function(e){e.preventDefault();e.stopPropagation();if(!config.readonly||config.readonly===1){var figure=$(this).parent();figure.tclass('checked');widget.change('update',figure)}});element.on('click','figure',function(){if(widget.readonly)return;var figure=$(this);var opt={};opt.backslashremove=true;opt.parent=figure;opt.cursor=isend?'end':'beg';widget.edit(figure.find('div'),opt,function(response){if(response.text){var newbie=figure[0].$newbie;if(newbie)delete figure[0].$newbie;response.change&&widget.change(newbie?'insert':'update',figure);if(newbie)widget.append(true);else widget.end()}else{figure.remove();widget.change('remove',figure);widget.end()}if(!element.find('figure').length)widget.remove()})});element.html(template(config));if(widget.newbie){var figure=element.find('figure');figure[0].$newbie=true;figure.trigger('click')}};
css: .paper-task figure{padding:0;margin:0;min-height:20px;display:block}.paper-task figure .checkbox{width:20px;height:20px;border:1px solid #D0D0D0;line-height:18px;color:#FFF;text-align:center;float:left;border-radius:var(--radius);margin:1px 0 0;font-size:12px;cursor:pointer}.paper-task figure .checkbox i{visibility:hidden}.paper-task figure .text{margin-left:30px}.readonly .paper-task figure .checkbox{cursor:not-allowed}.paper-task figure.checked .checkbox{background-color:var(--color);border-color:var(--color)}.paper-task figure.checked .checkbox i{visibility:visible}

name: Tasks
author: Total.js
js: exports.id='tasks';exports.name='Tasks';exports.version=1;exports.icon='ti ti-check-square';exports.author='Total.js';exports.version='1';exports.config={items:[]};exports.sortindex=7;exports.make=function(widget,config,element){var template=Tangular.compile('');var isnew=false,isend=false;widget.save=function(){var arr=[],elements=element.find('figure');for(var el of elements){el=$(el);arr.push({id:el.attrd('id'),name:el.find('.text').html(),checked:el.hclass('checked')})}return{items:arr}};var check=function(){if(!element.find('figure').length)widget.remove()};var append=function(el){var id=widget.makeid();var html=template({id:id,checked:false,name:''});if(el)el.after(html);else element.find('.wtasks-items').append(html);var figure=element.find('figure[data-id="{0}"]'.format(id));figure[0].$newbie=true;figure.trigger('click')};element.on('click','.checkbox',function(e){e.preventDefault();e.stopPropagation();if(!config.readonly||config.readonly===1){var figure=$(this).parent();figure.tclass('checked');widget.change('update',figure)}});element.on('click','figure',function(){if(widget.readonly)return;var figure=$(this);var opt={};opt.backslashremove=true;opt.parent=figure;opt.cursor=isend?'end':'beg';widget.edit(figure.find('div'),opt,function(response){if(response.text){var newbie=figure[0].$newbie;if(newbie)delete figure[0].$newbie;response.change&&widget.change(newbie?'insert':'update',figure);if(response.key===13||response.key===8)setTimeout(append,100,figure);else if(response.key===9){var n=figure.next();if(n.length){isend=true;setTimeout(()=>n.trigger('click'),100)}}}else{figure.remove();widget.change('remove',figure);widget.end()}check()})});widget.newbie&&append();var builder=[];for(var item of config.items)builder.push(template(item));if(builder.length)element.find('.wtasks-items').html(builder.join(''))};
css: .paper-tasks figure{padding:0;margin:0 0 3px;min-height:20px;display:block}.paper-tasks figure .checkbox{width:20px;height:20px;border:1px solid #D0D0D0;line-height:18px;color:#FFF;text-align:center;float:left;border-radius:var(--radius);margin:1px 0 0;font-size:12px}.paper-tasks figure .checkbox i{visibility:hidden}.paper-tasks figure .text{margin-left:30px}.paper-tasks figure.checked .checkbox{background-color:var(--color);border-color:var(--color)}.paper-tasks figure.checked .checkbox i{visibility:visible}
